name: TypeHandlerTest
description: Unit tests for TypeHandler class, which handles type conversions and object creation.

methods.name: createValueTestParameters
methods.signature: private static Stream<Arguments> createValueTestParameters() throws MalformedURLException

nested_classes.name: Instantiable
nested_classes.description: Used for Class and Object creation tests.

nested_classes.name: NotInstantiable
nested_classes.description: Used for Class and Object negative creation tests.

test_cases.name: testCreateClass
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a class instance from its name.

test_cases.name: testCreateFile
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a File object from its string representation.

test_cases.name: testCreateFiles
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of files, expecting an UnsupportedOperationException.

test_cases.name: testCreateNumber
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Number object from its string representation.

test_cases.name: testCreateObject
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of an Object instance from its class name.

test_cases.name: testCreateURL
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a URL object from its string representation.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of various types of objects from their string representations.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueExistingFile
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a FileInputStream from an existing file path.

test_cases.name: testnstantiableEquals
test_cases.description: Tests the equality of Instantiable objects.

test_cases.name: testOpenFile
test_cases.description: Tests the opening of a file and consuming its content.

test_cases.name: testRegister
test_cases.description: Tests the registration and retrieval of a custom converter in TypeHandler.
